Content.Text:
<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Greetings, <MYNAME>. It looks like another
fine day today.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Greetings, <MYNAME>. If I can be of any
counsel, please do not hesitate to come
talk with me.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Greetings, <MYNAME>. If you discover
something unusual, do let me see it too.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Greetings, <MYNAME>. Work must be quite
exhausting. Please don't overdo it.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Greetings, <MYNAME>. Oh dear, look at the
time. Losing yourself in thought is a
great way to lose a big chunk of time!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Greetings, <MYNAME>. Oh, did something
nice happen? You have such a big smile
on your face.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Greetings, <MYNAME>. It's so peaceful at
night, isn't it? Soothing to both body
and spirit.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Greetings, <MYNAME>. You must be exhausted
today! Please get lots of rest tonight.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Greetings, <MYNAME>. Oh dear, look at the
time. Losing yourself in thought is a
great way to lose a big chunk of time!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. What a fine day it is.
The wind and the sun are so gentle
today. Quite soothing!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. I was just listening to the
rain. It's almost as though you can hear
the earth breathing.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Isn't it hot today? You
can smell the earth and the summer
grass.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh,<MYNAME>. It's a rainy day, isn't it?
The plants look very happy.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Isn't the autumn foliage
so pretty? The bright hues take my
breath away.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. The autumn rain can chill
you to the bone. Take care that you
don't catch a cold.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Isn't it cold today? It's
pretty how the fallen snow reflects the
sunlight.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. It's so pretty today with
the snow dancing in the wind. Each fleck
of snow is like some winter sprite!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, <MYNAME>. You're out on a day like
this? You do work hard!
<PAGE>
Why don't you come in and rest a little?

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, <MYNAME>. You're out on a day like
this? You do work hard!
<PAGE>
Why don't you come in and rest a little?

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Oh, that reminds me. I
hear you found someone special?
Congratulations.
<PAGE>
When you're on a date, please come to my
shop. I'll give you a special discount.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This forest is so beautiful. You can
enjoy all the colors of each season. I
especially enjoy summer's rich greens.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This forest is home to sprites. You
cannot see them, but occasionally, you
can sense their presence.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Watching the easy flow of the river is
very soothing.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Isn't this river lovely? The sparkle on
the water's surface and the surroundings
is just like a landscape painting.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This lake is so majestic and mysterious.
It's almost as though gods reside within
it.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This town is very nice because we have
four very distinct seasons here. I'm
glad I came to this town.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Isn't it very difficult to manage such
a huge tract of land? Please don't push
yourself too hard.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Looking at the farm, I can tell exactly
what kind of farmer you are, <MYNAME>.
Please continue to work hard.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mining is just like an archeological
expedition. It excites my curiosity!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a quiet, soothing place. I could
stay here for hours.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I wonder what kind of change is in store
for this town... I can't wait to find
out.
<PAGE>
I'm looking forward to the town you
build, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I stroll through town looking at the
people and its surroundings and think
up new menus.
<PAGE>
It's difficult and yet fun. I become
engrossed in thought immediately.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town is very lively. I think I'll
discover something unusual here.
<PAGE>
I'm sure my shop will find lots of new
customers.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This town has gotten so lively. The flow
of so many people carries with it lots
of rare and unusual things.
<PAGE>
I'm going to be staying here in town,
of yes I am.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town has a very nice aura. I fell
in love with it at first sight.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love unusual things. Seeing and
hearing such things broaden my horizons.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since I serve tea and sweets at work, I
experiment a lot at home. My meals
therefore often consist of sweet dishes.
<PAGE>
<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I don't want to overeat and ruin my
health, so I always exercise regularly.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I correspond often with my friends and
family back in my homeland. They are
all interested in this town.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love to talk to people. People like
you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Back in my homeland, I worked at many
jobs. As a result, I made many friends.
<PAGE>
What kind of work? I shall leave that to
your imagination.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, thank you for always being so
kind to me.
<PAGE>
Talking with you is my favorite pastime,
<MYNAME>. Please continue to be my friend.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
*Giggle* This looks delicious. Mango
cake is my very favorite.
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I shall relish every
morsel with my tea.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
*Giggle* What a lovely present.
<ITEMNAME0> is a favorite of mine.
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. You are such a
wonderful person!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my, this is for me? It's something
that I like. Tank you.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, this is for me? Thank you.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You're giving this to me? To be honest,
this is not my favorite, but you have
my gratitude.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
To be honest, I really dislike this. You
should probably give it to someone else.
But, I gratefully accept.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
This is the thing that I dislike the
most. I'm sure someone else would enjoy
it more, but you have my gratitude.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, a <ITEMNAME0>! Such an unusual gift.
Are you sure this is for me?
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I'm going to admire
it, then prepare it in a dish.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, a <ITEMNAME0>! Such a fine gift for
me? I appreciate this so much!
<PAGE>
I'm going to take a photo of it, then
display it in my room. Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your thoughtfulness is noted. Thank
you.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I just received some earlier, so that's
more than enough for today. Thank you.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, could this be a birthday present?
I'm so thankful to be remembered.
<PAGE>
Plus, it's mango cake... How lucky I am.
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, could this be a birthday present? 
I'm honored to be remembered.
<PAGE>
Plus, it's <ITEMNAME0>... I'm so happy.
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, could this be a birthday present? 
<PAGE>
I'm so thankful to be remembered. Thank
you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, could this be a birthday present? 
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, could this be a birthday present?
<PAGE>
You really needn't have gone through all
that trouble. Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, could this be a birthday present?
<PAGE>
I really don't think it's suitable for
me... but I gratefully accept, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, could this be a birthday present?
<PAGE>
I think this is wasted on me, but I
gratefully accept, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, could this be a birthday present?
<PAGE>
I can't believe this huge vegetable is
for me... thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, could this be a birthday present?
Thank you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I can't believe this huge vegetable is
for me, for my birthday. I'm very
fortunate.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, a chick. I hope she grows up big
quickly!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, a hen. Do your best to lay eggs, all
right?

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, such a large hen. How unusual.
Leave it to <MYNAME> to raise such a large
bird!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, how cute. I'm starting to want one
too.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, someone's a little overweight! You
are the one giving the food, so manage
the portions a little more carefully!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, how nice. I'm starting to want one
too.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, someone's a little overweight! You
are the one giving the food, so manage
the portions a little more carefully!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, how cute. I'm starting to want one
too.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, someone's a little overweight! You
are the one giving the food, so manage
the portions a little more carefully!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, how cute. I'm starting to want one
too.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, someone's a little overweight! You
are the one giving the food, so manage
the portions a little more carefully!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, for me? A present for the
Flower Festival! How nice.
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, for me? I suppose it's nice to feel
like a child once in a while.
<PAGE>
Thank you for the candy, <MYNAME>. It
looks quite delicious.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I have a fiancé, so I cannot accept.
*giggle*... How unfortunate.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I have a fiancé, so I cannot accept.
*giggle*... How unfortunate.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, did you catch that? You like birds,
don't you, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, how cute. Makes me want to own one
too.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you caught that? <MYNAME>, you must
like turtles.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, it's your birthday today, isn't
it? My best wishes to you.
<PAGE>
I have a present for you. I hope you
will accept it.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy birthday, <MYNAME>. Please do your
best from now on too.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's been quite a while. I hadn't
seen you lately. How have you been?
<PAGE>
Do stop by my shop once in a while for
some tea.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome to Chai Kanon. Please enjoy
your stay here with some lovely tea and
confectionaries.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm having my meal right now. Pardon me,
but can we do this later?

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aren't purple benches lovely? I love the
color purple.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like bricks that are placed with no
particular design in mind. It stimulates
one's imagination.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a lovely table. The solid wood and
the warmth it exudes are quite pleasing.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What an unusual table. The rustic look
of the interlaced wood is very nice.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is that red table used for?
<PAGE>
<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>...Oh, you sit on it and partake of tea?
Now that sounds lovely. I would love
to try it sometime.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a large umbrella. Oh, it's a sun
parasol for taking tea in the garden?
Such refined taste.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a chic street light. It has two
bulbs which light up the night and give
a nice aura to the town.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a chic paper lantern. Light that
filters through paper is very soft, like
a floating dream.
<PAGE>
I'd like to place one in my room, too.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
For some reason, looking at brick makes
me feel very nostalgic.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a small totem pole. Still, it's not
without its charm, and it's small enough
to put in my room!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You have a unique statue. That's the
symbol of the sun in the center, yes?
<PAGE>
Strange, how I feel power just from
standing here.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you ever thought about getting on a
minecart and going wherever you want?
<PAGE>
<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>It would be great to leave it to the
rails to take you to places you've never
been.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's something like a watchtower. Is
it a viewing platform?
<PAGE>
The view from high places is wonderful,
isn't it?

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Three bamboos and a young pine... if you
also had plum, that would make a grand
pine decoration.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This part of town has many things that
pique my curiosity.
<PAGE>
I love unusual things, so being here is
such fun.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I feel uplifted when I see white
marguerites.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I like tulips because of the nice
balance between the flower and the stem.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The large yellow sunflower is the symbol
of warmth.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hydrangeas come in such mysterious
shades of purple. The hues are so
delicate and match perfectly.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Red gerberas are so cute. They may be
dainty, but they possess such bold
character.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Isn't "snowdrop" such a pretty name?
You can immediately tell what kind of
flower they are.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Gentians blooming on the roadside are
pretty, aren't they? Such a refreshing
sight when you're taking a walk.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I feel uplifted when I see white
marguerites.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I like tulips because of the nice
balance between the flower and the stem.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The large yellow sunflower is the symbol
of warmth.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hydrangeas come in such mysterious
shades of purple. The hues are so
delicate and match perfectly.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Red gerberas are so cute. They may be
dainty, but they possess such bold
character.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Isn't "snowdrop" such a pretty name?
You can immediately tell what kind of
flower they are.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Gentians blooming on the roadside are
pretty, aren't they? Such a refreshing
sight when you're taking a walk.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love the color purple, so that purple
flower basket is nice.
<PAGE>
<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>But I think finding the right flowers
for it might be difficult.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A potted cone has such a nice shape.
It's the perfect decoration for the
Starry Night Festival.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Cherry trees are so bright and pretty.
Cherry blossom is what makes spring so
exciting.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Gingko trees with autumn foliage are so
pretty. Their fallen leaves fill the
town with autumn hues, too.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A lattice fence is good since it serves
as a blinder. It would be even nicer if
some flowers were placed there.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A pot shaped like a watering can? Or is
this an actual one used to plant
flowers?
<PAGE>
Whichever it is, how interesting. You
have a wonderful sense of design.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Flower arches are pretty, aren't they?
Especially those with blue flowers
entwined around them.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A gazebo is perfect for taking a rest
during a walk in the garden.
<PAGE>
Having a chair here to drink tea at my
leisure would be nice too.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A curved arbor is perfect for the corner
of any garden. An arrangement of flowers
just makes it even nicer.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Purple is my favorite color. I like
purple fences too.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Brick walls are nice. They have such a
historic feel.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so grateful for everything you do,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
And oh, this is a thank-you for the
present. Please accept it.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so grateful for everything you do,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
And oh, this is a thank-you for the
present. Please accept it.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so grateful for everything you do,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
And oh, this is a thank-you for the
present. Please accept it.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so grateful for everything you do,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
And oh, this is a thank-you for the
present. Please accept it.

Now is not the time to be giving
presents.
